title: Volkswagen’s new Caddy Alltrack blends practicality with ruggedness
content:
Volkswagen will travel to the Frankfurt Motor Show to introduce a rugged-looking van named Caddy Alltrack. Designed for Europe, the Alltrack gains black plastic trim, roof rails, a specific grille, and, on select configurations, a nicer interior. 
 
The post Volkswagen’s new Caddy Alltrack blends practicality with ruggedness appeared first on Digital Trends .
